extendedInfo.description: - ANDROID CENTRALFinger Army 1942: A whack-a-mole game worth your 99 cents...We're all familiar with the arcade classic "whack-a-mole" type games, but how does that translate into an Android app? Pretty darn well in Finger Army 1942.- ANDROID AUTHORITYFinger Army 1942 is a fun whack-a-mole Android game- 91 MOBILESThe  games features really great graphics and can be enjoyed by all age groups. It is a great game for touchscreen devices, you have to hammer the enemy fingers.The new enemy characters that get unlocked at every level are very innovative. A great deal of thought has been given to the facial expressions that are downright amusing. The game can be quite addictive. So, happy thumping away!- FAMIGO Recommends for Kids, Tweens and Teens.- Editor Picked by AppEggs.comIf you like FRUIT NINJA you'll love this!Sharpen those reflexes, crack your knuckles and ready your fingers! Grown using clippings from our own creative fingers, the Tin Planet lab brings to you an Army of giant mutant fingers. Yes folks, one frenzied finger wave after another, this formidable foe continues to attack your very own shores and the challenge is yours to stop them!Finger Army 1942 is a beautifully crafted, light hearted version the family favourite Whack'a'Mole and features the same fast, furious and finger numbing action as the original but with so much more...Increase your rank and unlock new enemy fingers as you progress through the levels taking care to avoid medics and the cowardly 'yella belly' soldiers waving the white flag of surrender. Crack open tins of every good soldier's staple diet, Bully Beef, for extra bonus points. Steal enemy supply drops to replenish your health and take out 'Ham', the field radio op for extra time. Look out for the 'Big G', the highly prized General of the Finger Army and be sure to catch his hat for the Finger Frenzy bonus! Remember, these fingers fight back; keep your eyes peeled for the cannon wielding 'Treadhead' and his bigger brother and hammer them down before they take you out.NEW for v3. VS BATTLE MODE!!Paper, Scissors, Stone is officially redundant! The Finger Army 1942 'VS BATTLE' Mode is the new way to settle any argument. Play as Attackers or Defenders and sit opposite your opponent in battleship style and slug it out. The rules are simple, just like tug of war, if your side is on the right side of the line when the time runs out, you win the battle. The first person to reach 5 medals wins the war!Key Features:â¢	NEW 2 Player 'VS BATTLE' Modeâ¢	Stunning Graphicsâ¢	Competitive fun for all agesâ¢	Simple single tap game playâ¢	Game play feedback and bonus awardsâ¢	Unlock new enemy charactersâ¢	Helps with coordination, reflexes and fast thinkingâ¢	One off payment - No In App PurchasesTin Planet is always looking for suggestions. Visit our Facebook Page and tell us your ideas for future updates and drop us a 'like' whilst you're there!

reviews.title: SIMPLY EXCELLENT
reviews.comment: Superb graphics. Very addictive. Starts easy and progresses well. The later rounds are fast and furious but somehow you keep up! Love the audio too. Would definitely recommend for both young and old.
reviews.author: Jane Rainer

reviews.title: Great fun
reviews.comment: Great well presented little time waster, buy it now!
reviews.author: Richard Thorn

reviews.title: Look at those permissions
reviews.comment: \"This application requires no special permissions to run.\" No IAP\'s, no privacy concerns, great fun for kids - instant buy and five stars
reviews.author: Igor Farago

reviews.title: So much fun!
reviews.comment: Simple, addictive, looks great and runs really smoothly. Will be keeping an eye out for future Tin Planet games!
reviews.author: Stu Lleksu

reviews.title: Fun and addictive
reviews.comment: If you like games like fruit ninja this is the game for you. It has no IAPs, simple game play. Best for kids.
reviews.author: selva kumar

reviews.title: Pretty boring
reviews.comment: Good for kids, but gets boring quickly
reviews.author: Andrew Nolan

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: This game is very addictive have wasted an afternoon playing it today but going to get a better score tomorrow ...
reviews.author: Mark Bullent

reviews.title: Finger Army
reviews.comment: Awesome fun and awesome graphics!!! I can\'t stop playing!!
reviews.author: helen denny

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Great game! Really good graphics and good fun.
reviews.author: Robin Masefield

reviews.title: So addictive!! 5 stars
reviews.comment: What a great game so addictive and easily worth 59p, you\'ll definitely get your moneys worth. My daughter and I love playing it!!
reviews.author: Paul Streatfield
